--- In archive-crawler@yahoog=
roups.com, "pandae667" <aaron667@...> 
wrote:
>
> Hi Cody,
> 
> thanks alot=
 for your feedback about this processor.
> 
> I think your problems do matc=
h into one of two categories:
> 
> 1) The StackOverflowError is caused by d=
ocuments simply being to 
huge
> (Almost 3MB in your case). The class comme=
nts of JerichoExtractor
> mentions limiting the document size to be process=
ed by this 
processor
> (I have the limit set to 700kB) Another possible wo=
rkarround might 
be
> simply increasing your VMs stacksize (using the -Xss =
command line
> option in Suns JVM)
> 
> 2) Those NullPointerExceptions migh=
t simply be caused by a bug in 
the
> jerichoHTML parser library. You can r=
ead about the bug over there:
> http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?
f=
unc=3Ddetail&aid=3D1597587&group_id=3D101067&atid=3D628968
> (and also find=
 a version of the lib that has the mentioned bug
> allready fixed linked un=
der the same URL)
> 
> Hope this helps you solving your problems.
> 
> Rega=
rds
>   Olaf Freyer
>
